meta.title: Complete Guide to GST Filing for Small Businesses in 2025
meta.description: Learn everything about GST registration, return filing, and compliance requirements for small businesses in India.
meta.author: CA Rajesh Kumar

sections.content: GST (Goods and Services Tax) has revolutionized the tax structure in India. For small business owners, understanding GST compliance is crucial for smooth operations.
GST is an indirect tax levied on the supply of goods and services in India. It has replaced multiple indirect taxes like VAT, Service Tax, and Excise Duty.

items: CGST - Central Goods and Services Tax
SGST - State Goods and Services Tax
IGST - Integrated Goods and Services Tax

sections.content: Businesses need to register for GST if:

items: Annual turnover exceeds ₹40 lakhs (₹20 lakhs for special category states)

sections.content: Always ensure your invoice details match with your GSTR-1 returns to avoid mismatches.
